column5: Great apt in Uptown, Dallas. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, American Airlines Center, & adjacent to the Katy Trail and McKinney Ave. Parking spaces available in covered, underground parking garage. Washer & dryer in unit. Prefer quiet guests because my unit is right next to the leasing office. Uptown is a busy neighborhood, and my unit windows face the street, so some street noise is unavoidable, sorry! Great option for 1 or 2 guests, but 3 is definitely a crowd! Happy vacay, y'all!
